name: Superior_Attuned_Superior_Malice_of_the_Corruptor_D
display_name: Superior Attuned Superior Malice of the Corruptor D
display_fullname: Boosts.Superior Attuned Malice of the Corruptor D
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Enhances the damage by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}% and reduces endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. This enhancement can only be slotted by Corruptors and may be slotted into any Corruptor damage power.
display_short_help: Set: Superior Malice of the Corruptor
power_display_names: Superior Malice of the Corruptor: Damage/Endurance/Recharge
power_short_helps: Enhances Damage, Reduces Endurance Cost, and Increases Attack Rate
